name: Bilal Hussain
title: Senior Full-Stack Developer | AI-Native Workflow
headline: Senior full-stack developer specializing in Django and React with AI-native development workflow. Daily Claude Code power user. Harvard CS. Multi-agent AI systems + RAG pipelines.

projects.name: EssayMentor AI
projects.description: 6-agent essay generation system for college admissions using LangGraph and a RAG pipeline for context-aware AI assistance. A/B tested Llama 3.1 vs fine-tuned Mistral 7B to evaluate reliability, latency, and quality metrics.
projects.outcomes: Built production-grade multi-agent pipeline with 6 specialized agents (research, outline, drafting, editing, feedback, revision). Implemented RAG pipeline for context-aware assistance. Base model outperformed fine-tuned alternatives in A/B testing.

projects.name: CoreZenith
projects.description: Real-time educational platform supporting 50+ concurrent users with WebRTC video conferencing and WebSocket-based terminal synchronization for virtual classrooms.
projects.outcomes: Developed real-time collaborative coding environments. Built complex terminal synchronization for virtual classrooms. Supports 50+ concurrent users.

projects.name: MCPForge
projects.description: Multi-server MCP toolkit: ATS resume optimizer, portfolio query server, and GitHub intelligence server. 3 npm-published MCP servers + Next.js demo app with live JSON-RPC protocol inspector.
projects.outcomes: 3 published MCP servers on npm. Implemented Streamable HTTP transport, multi-server orchestration, and protocol-level visibility with live inspector.

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
bullets: Work daily in existing MERN stack codebase across three interconnected applications (company portal, admin interface, investor portal)
Use Claude Code to accelerate delivery of iterative tasks: auth workflows, API integrations, bug fixes
Architected authorization workflow improvements, eliminating manual session storage clearing and resolving critical authentication bugs
Established automated testing infrastructure using Playwright, alongside MongoDB integration testing
Operate independently with minimal supervision, communicating progress clearly and flagging blockers early

experience.title: Lead Software Engineer
bullets: Built patient data platform using Python (Django REST Framework) backend + React/TypeScript frontend
Designed PostgreSQL database schema for HIPAA-compliant sensitive patient data
Engineered RESTful APIs enabling real-time data synchronization with third-party EHR systems
Containerized with Docker, automated CI/CD to AWS — reduced deployment time by 40%
Mentored 3 junior engineers, established Git workflow and testing best practices

experience.title: Computer Science Instructor
bullets: Designed curriculum covering Python, JavaScript, algorithms, and data structures
Strong communication skills developed through teaching complex technical concepts

valueProps: AI-native development workflow: Daily Claude Code power user who builds at ~3x speed and knows when to trust AI output vs when to correct it
Harvard CS + 5+ years production full-stack experience (Django + React)
Built multi-agent AI systems with RAG pipelines (EssayMentor 6-agent pipeline with LangGraph)
Full-stack depth: Python/Django backend + React/TypeScript frontend + PostgreSQL/MongoDB data layer
Proven ability to work independently in existing codebases with minimal hand-holding
